banner.title: The First Nudist Barbershop in Europe
banner.description: Get ready for a unique, intense, and absolutely limitless experience. Here, style meets freedom. Forget the clothes, forget the conventional – it's just you, the razor, and the pleasure of feeling completely free.

p.1: Chico Nudist Barbershop was born from a bold and liberating idea — inspired by Chico’s experiences in other countries, where he discovered places dedicated to male care without barriers, without masks, and without prejudice.
p.2: Here, all men are welcome exactly as they are. There are no judgments, only acceptance, respect, and a safe environment where naturalness is celebrated. The body is just part of the experience — the focus is on well-being, confidence, and the freedom to be authentic.
p.3: More than just a barbershop, this is a space for relaxation and discovery, where each client can unwind, talk, laugh, and perhaps explore new sensations and fantasies they never imagined.
p.4: In the end, it all comes down to this:
p.5: feeling good in your own skin.

1.name: Haircut
1.description: Modern or classic cuts performed by experienced professionals. We use current techniques to ensure a result that matches your style. A complete service that includes finishing with high-quality products.

2.name: Beard / Beard Therapy
2.description: Complete beard treatment with hydration, shaping, and traditional barbershop techniques. Includes hot towel, special oils, and professional finishing for a clean and renewed look.

3.name: Waxing / Machine Hair Removal
3.description: Hair removal service using wax or machine, depending on the client’s preference. Effectively removes hair, leaving the skin smoother and more comfortable. Ideal for those seeking practicality and hygiene.

4.name: Relaxing Massage
4.description: A gentle massage that relieves tension and reduces everyday stress. Uses light and enveloping movements to promote deep relaxation. Perfect for restoring energy and balance.

5.name: Hot Stone Massage
5.description: Therapeutic massage using heated stones to relieve muscle pain. The heat penetrates deeply, providing intense relaxation. Ideal for those suffering from accumulated tension.

6.name: Body Scrub Massage
6.description: A combination of relaxing massage with a full body exfoliation. Removes dead skin cells, stimulates circulation, and leaves the skin softer and renewed. A revitalizing experience that blends well-being and aesthetic care.
